languages.text: "Информация о том, что гимн восстановления контактной цепи является паролем для проникновения в укрытие электрожрецов, занесена в архив". {n}Паскаль отвечает на это суровыми ритмами сдерживающей арии.{/n} "Со скорбью определяю, что ритуал культистов был частично успешен. Мой технобрат запятнан скверной — его обуял схизматикаль, нечестивое подобие духа машины. Реквестирую немедленную активацию протокола техзорцизма".

"Information archived to the effect that the circuit restoration hymn is the entrance password to the Electro-Priests' hiding-place." {n}Pasqal responds with the dour rhythms of a containment aria.{/n} "I note with great sorrow that the cultists' ritual has been partially successful. My tech-brother has been tainted by corruption. He is in the grip of a schismatical, an unholy imitation of a machine spirit. I request immediate activation of the techsorcism protocol."
languages.original_text: "Информация о том, что гимн восстановления контактной цепи является паролем для проникновения в укрытие электрожрецов, занесена в архив". {n}Паскаль отвечает на это суровыми ритмами сдерживающей арии.{/n} "Со скорбью определяю, что ритуал культистов был частично успешен. My tech-brother has been tainted by corruption. He is in the grip of a schismatical, an unholy imitation of a machine spirit. I request immediate activation of the techsorcism protocol."

languages.text: "Archivierte Informationen deuten darauf hin, dass die Hymne der Kontaktkreis-Restoration das Passwort zum Versteck der Elektropriester ist." {n}Pasqal antwortet mit den mürrischen Rhythmen einer Eindämmungsarie.{/n} "Ich stelle mit großer Trauer fest, dass das Ritual der Kultisten teilweise erfolgreich war. Mein Tech-Bruder wurde von der Korruption befleckt. Er befindet sich in der Umklammerung eines Abtrünnigen, einer unheiligen Imitation eines Maschinengeists. Ich erbitte sofortige Aktivierung des Techsorzismus-Protokolls."
languages.original_text: "Information archived to the effect that the circuit restoration hymn is the entrance password to the Electro-Priests' hiding-place." {n}Pasqal responds with the dour rhythms of a containment aria.{/n} "I note with great sorrow that the cultists' ritual has been partially successful. My tech-brother has been tainted by corruption. He is in the grip of a schismatical, an unholy imitation of a machine spirit. I request immediate activation of the techsorcism protocol."

traits.locale_text: "Archivierte Informationen deuten darauf hin, dass die Hymne der Kontaktkreis-Restoration das Passwort zum Versteck der Elektropriester ist." {n}Pasqal antwortet mit den mürrischen Rhythmen einer Eindämmungsarie.{/n} "Ich stelle mit großer Trauer fest, dass das Ritual der Kultisten teilweise erfolgreich war. Mein Tech-Bruder wurde von der Korruption befleckt. Er befindet sich in der Umklammerung eines Abtrünnigen, einer unheiligen Imitation eines Maschinengeists. Ich erbitte sofortige Aktivierung des Techsorzismus-Protokolls."

languages.text: « Information archivée. L'hymne de restauration des circuits correspond au mot de passe permettant d'accéder à la cachette des électro-prêtres. » {n}Pasqal répond avec le rythme austère d'une aria de confinement.{/n} « Je constate avec grand regret que le rituel de ces cultistes a réussi partiellement. La corruption a souillé mon technofrère, il est aux mains d'un schismatique, une imitation impie d'un esprit de la machine. Je demande une activation immédiate du protocole de techxorcisme. »
languages.original_text: "Information archived to the effect that the circuit restoration hymn is the entrance password to the Electro-Priests' hiding-place." {n}Pasqal responds with the dour rhythms of a containment aria.{/n} "I note with great sorrow that the cultists' ritual has been partially successful. My tech-brother has been tainted by corruption. He is in the grip of a schismatical, an unholy imitation of a machine spirit. I request immediate activation of the techsorcism protocol."

traits.locale_text: « Information archivée. L'hymne de restauration des circuits correspond au mot de passe permettant d'accéder à la cachette des électroprêtres. » {n}Pasqal répond avec le rythme austère d'une aria de confinement.{/n} « Je constate avec grand regret que le rituel de ces cultistes a réussi partiellement. La corruption a souillé mon technofrère, il est aux mains d'un schismatique, une imitation impie d'un esprit de la machine. Je demande une activation immédiate du protocole de techxorcisme. »

languages.text: “信息档案显示，电路修复赞美诗是电僧藏匿处的入口密码。”{n}帕斯卡以阴郁的语气，抑扬顿挫地说着。{/n}“我注意到，邪教仪式取得了部分成功，这让我悲痛不已。我的技术兄弟遭到了腐化，他受到了‘分离者’，也就是邪恶机魂的控制。我请求立即启动技术巫术协议。”
languages.original_text: "Information archived to the effect that the circuit restoration hymn is the entrance password to the Electro-Priests' hiding-place." {n}Pasqal responds with the dour rhythms of a containment aria.{/n} "I note with great sorrow that the cultists' ritual has been partially successful. My tech-brother has been tainted by corruption. He is in the grip of a schismatical, an unholy imitation of a machine spirit. I request immediate activation of the techsorcism protocol."

traits.locale_text: “信息档案显示，电路修复赞美诗是驭电祭司藏匿处的入口密码。”{n}帕斯卡以阴郁的语气，抑扬顿挫地说着。{/n}“我注意到，邪教仪式取得了部分成功，这让我悲痛不已。我的技术兄弟遭到了腐化，他受到了‘分离者’，也就是邪恶机魂的控制。我请求立即启动技术巫术协议。”

languages.text: 「エレクトロ・プリーストの隠れ家に入るパスワードは、回路復元の聖歌であるという趣旨の情報がアーカイブされました」{n}パスカルは、不機嫌そうなリズムで抑制の詠唱を奏でつつ返事をする。{/n}「狂信者の儀式が一部成功したことは、実に残念なものだ。技術同志は腐敗に汚されている。分離派の手に落ち、機械精霊の不浄なる紛い物に支配された。テクソシズムプロトコルの即時アクティブ化を要求しましょう」
languages.original_text: "Information archived to the effect that the circuit restoration hymn is the entrance password to the Electro-Priests' hiding-place." {n}Pasqal responds with the dour rhythms of a containment aria.{/n} "I note with great sorrow that the cultists' ritual has been partially successful. My tech-brother has been tainted by corruption. He is in the grip of a schismatical, an unholy imitation of a machine spirit. I request immediate activation of the techsorcism protocol."

traits.locale_text: 「エレクトロ・プリーストの隠れ家に入るパスワードは、回路復元の聖歌だという趣旨の情報がアーカイブされた」{n}パスカルは、不機嫌そうなリズムで抑制の詠唱を奏でて返事をする。{/n}「魔女団の儀式が一部成功したことは、深く悲しいものだ。我が技術の同志は腐敗に汚されている。彼は分裂した、機械精霊の不浄の紛い物に支配されている。技術プロトコルの即時アクティブ化を要求しよう」

languages.text: «Información archivada según la cual el himno de restauración del circuito es la contraseña de entrada al escondite de los Electrosacerdotes». {n}Pasqal responde con los sombríos ritmos de un aria de contención{/n} «Observo con gran pesar que el ritual de los cultistas ha tenido un éxito parcial. Mi hermano tecnológico ha sido corrompido. Está en las garras de un cismático, una imitación impía de un espíritu máquina. Solicito la activación inmediata del protocolo de tecnoexorcismo».
languages.original_text: "Information archived to the effect that the circuit restoration hymn is the entrance password to the Electro-Priests' hiding-place." {n}Pasqal responds with the dour rhythms of a containment aria.{/n} "I note with great sorrow that the cultists' ritual has been partially successful. My tech-brother has been tainted by corruption. He is in the grip of a schismatical, an unholy imitation of a machine spirit. I request immediate activation of the techsorcism protocol."

traits.locale_text: «Información archivada según la cual el himno de restauración del circuito es la contraseña de entrada al escondite de los Electrosacerdotes». {n}Pasqal responde con los sombríos ritmos de un aria de contención{/n} «Observo con gran pesar que el ritual de los cultistas ha tenido un éxito parcial. Mi hermano tecnológico ha sido corrompido. Está en las garras de un cismático, una imitación impía de un espíritu máquina. Solicito la activación inmediata del protocolo de tecnoexorcismo».

languages.text: "Devre onarım ilahisinin, Elektro Rahiplerin sığınağına giriş şifresi olduğu yönünde arşiv bilgilerine ulaşıldı." {n}Pasqal, dizginleme aryasının kasvetli ritmiyle karşılık veriyor.{/n} "Ne yazık ki Tarikatçıların ayini, kısmen de olsa başarıya ulaşmış. Tekno kardeşim, yozlaşmanın batağına düşmüş. Makine ruhunun uğursuz bir taklidi olan bölücü, onu pençesine almış. Teknokovuç protokolünün derhâl başlatılmasını talep ediyorum."
languages.original_text: "Information archived to the effect that the circuit restoration hymn is the entrance password to the Electro-Priests' hiding-place." {n}Pasqal responds with the dour rhythms of a containment aria.{/n} "I note with great sorrow that the cultists' ritual has been partially successful. My tech-brother has been tainted by corruption. He is in the grip of a schismatical, an unholy imitation of a machine spirit. I request immediate activation of the techsorcism protocol."

traits.locale_text: "Devre onarım ilahisinin, Elektro Rahiplerin sığınağına giriş şifresi olduğu yönünde arşiv bilgilerine ulaşıldı." {n}Pasqal, dizginleme aryasının haşin ritmiyle karşılık veriyor.{/n} "Ne yazık ki Tarikatçıların ayini, kısmen de olsa başarıya ulaştı. Tekno kardeşim, yozlaşma tarafından kirletildi. Makine ruhunun günahkâr bir taklidi olan bölücü, onu pençesine aldı. Tekno arınma protokolünün derhâl başlatılmasını talep ediyorum."
